short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quality of life changes to Ferzu

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension adds some quality of life changes to the Ferzu website.

Features so far :
- Autofill most fields when reporting someone
- Options page that allows saving an email address for the report quick-fill
- Added quick report buttons from uncredited art and troll accounts
